thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Hospitality
thread.title_full: Good Hospitality - Review of Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mervyn G
title: Good Hospitality
text: I've been to London On a Few Occasion's, and Stayed in Various Hotels , However Staying at the Point A Hotel was Completely Different Experience. Right from Step1 i..e Checking In at the Guest Services to the Servce at the Bar and Restaurant the Staff were Always Welcoming,with a Smile. and Also Professional at the Same Time. Point A hotel Definetly on My Next Visit List and Also Highly Reccomendable to My Mate's.
